scripts.install:all: npm install && cd api && npm install && cd ../web && npm install
scripts.db:migrate: cd api && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd api && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd api && npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.build: cd api && npm run build && cd ../web && npm run build
scripts.lint: cd api && npm run lint && cd ../web && npm run lint
